pkgmetadata.longdescription: Heligman Pollard mortality model parameter estimation using Bayesian Melding with Incremental Mixture Importance Sampling // This package provides all the functions necessary to estimate the 8 parameters of the Heligman Pollard mortality model using a Bayesian Melding procedure with IMIS as well as to convert those parameters into age-specifc probabilities of death and a corresponding life table
